name: Digital Technology International
tag_list: newspaper, newspaper-software, publishing-software, ad-targeting, cloud-publishing, saas-publishing, healthcare
overview: Digital Technology International (DTI) delivers audience-centric Web, print, and mobile solutions to publishers around the world. Media companies use DTI software to delivering targeted news and advertising content. DTI solutions are successfully implemented at more than 2,000 customer sites around the globe with more than 100 publishing in DTI Cloud. All solutions - Advertising, ContentPublisher, Circulation, AudienceReach, Financials and Lightning CMS are available both on-premises and in the cloud.
